query: SELECT c.id as cid, c.fullName, c.state, c.hasGas, c.gasAppliances, c.hasPool, c.hasEV, c.existingSolar, p.id as pid, p.status, p.electricityBillId, p.gasBillId, LEFT(CAST(p.calculations AS CHAR), 2000) as calc_start FROM customers c LEFT JOIN proposals p ON p.customerId = c.id WHERE c.fullName LIKE '%Anastasios%';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2p3K1dfddpGHimM.570595ac1fed --database P6CTqT8eNBMi3wEqmJdcEm --execute SELECT c.id as cid, c.fullName, c.state, c.hasGas, c.gasAppliances, c.hasPool, c.hasEV, c.existingSolar, p.id as pid, p.status, p.electricityBillId, p.gasBillId, LEFT(CAST(p.calculations AS CHAR), 2000) as calc_start FROM customers c LEFT JOIN proposals p ON p.customerId = c.id WHERE c.fullName LIKE '%Anastasios%';
